featured.text: The new vaccine was banned by the Food and Drug Administration due to its fatal side effects.

definition.zh_def: 疫苗是一種用於預防疾病的生物製劑，通常通過刺激免疫系統產生抗體來達到效果。
definition.en_def: A vaccine is a biological preparation that provides active acquired immunity to a particular infectious disease by stimulating the immune system.
definition.example: The vaccine helped reduce the spread of the virus in the community.
